channel.title: Need help from experienced megascape coder!
channel.description: can sum1 plz help i cant make myself owner or admin and i cant ban the guy that keeps crashing my server i know how to do it but it wont save do i have to compile or sumthing?

item.title: Need help from experienced megascape coder!
item.dc:creator: @pur3_d3ath pur3 d3ath
item.description:
@pur3_d3ath wrote:

ill help you…

first go to client.java and press ctrl+f and find //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

below it you should see something that says if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("MoD Pur3")) { playerRights = 2;

replace the thing that says “YOURUSERNAMEHERE” with your username, and the thing that says "playerRights = 2; with what you want the player rights to be…

1=mod(silver crown) 2=staff(gold crown) 3=admin(owner)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from experienced megascape coder!

item.title: Need help from experienced megascape coder!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

It should work by changing your player rights in the save game, just make sure you’re offline when you do it. If you are online, and sign out after you changed, the game will save and you will be sent back to playerrights == 1

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from experienced megascape coder!
